about_the_game:
Cyber Courier 2088 is an cyberpunk sci-fi courier game, where you start out as a taxi driver transporting passengers and goods in a crazy low-poly world.

Transport people and packages within cities and to other cities / locations.

Earn Credits and buy weapons and items.

Navigate Sky Highways

Track down targets and claim their bounty's

Playtester's Feedback Most Welcome

Join the Discord and give your feedback and suggestions
Join our Discord => See Steam Links

New builds often.

Gameplay Already Added During Current Playtest so far...

1. Vehicle Explodes - Player respawns at Cyber Doc / Vehicle Respawns at Repair Dock
2. Added : Testing Asteroid Field Package Delivery Locations (1 for now)
3. Added : EVA, Police Drone Banners, Ui Marker Update and many bug fixes 
4. Added : Pirate's at Asteroid Belts 
5. Added : Ability to Tow Vehicles, Stranded Vehicle Missions, Towing Ui
6. Added : Boost Fuel & Store Item 
7. Added : Hover Bike
8. Added : Collect Trash

9. Added : Bounty Missions [Foundation]
10. Added : Police waiting to trap you for speeding

11. Added : Hack your crime stat

12. Added : Vehicle Upgrades
13. Added : Fare Bonus (Watch your driving courier)
14. Added : Message Panel (The start of the mission board/ message list)
15. Added : Settings - Volume sliders: Music, SFX, Ambient, Voice

Planned Gameplay

1. You are the Taxi Driver / Courier - Playable

2. Transport Fare's and Packages - Playable

3. Repair you vehicle - Playable

4. Get Chased by Sky Police, Evade Police, Police do have WEAPONS !

5. Hide in the Fog avoid Police or Pirates

6. Hack Your Crime Stat and Restore your License Points 

7. Stay in Credit on your License and Crime Stat

8. Expand Play Area

9. Collect and Sell Scrap and other items from PVE

10. Get a drink at the bar.... 

11. Upgrade your character and vehicle

12. Track down targets / Bounty Hunting

Want to make suggestions ?

Then join our Discord => See Steam Links

Cyber Courier 2088 is an cyberpunk sci-fi courier game, where you start out as a taxi driver transporting passengers and goods in a crazy low-poly world.

Transport people and packages within cities and to other cities / locations.

name: Cyber Courier 2088

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.4 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti or equivalent, 2GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specifications may change during development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 4 cores / 4 threads @ 3.2Ghz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specifications may change during development

short_description: Cyber Courier 2088 is an cyberpunk sci-fi courier game, where you start out as a taxi driver transporting passengers and goods as you become a sought after cyber courier in a crazy low-poly Sci-Fi world.
